trans-unit.source: Generates types and attribute declarations from internal type mapping information for XML schema element declarations.
trans-unit.target: 从 XML 架构元素声明的内部类型映射信息生成类型和属性声明。

trans-unit.source: The XmlCodeExporter class generates .NET Framework types or attribute declarations from internal mappings to .NET Framework types.
trans-unit.target: XmlCodeExporter 类生成.NET Framework 类型或属性声明从内部映射到.NET Framework 类型。

trans-unit.source: These internal mappings are generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> class for elements defined in an XSD document or as parts in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 这些内部映射都由<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter>定义 XSD 文档中或作为 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中的部件的元素的类。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter>

trans-unit.source: XmlCodeExporter is not used directly; it is used with the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).
trans-unit.target: 不直接; 使用 XmlCodeExporter它是与 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 或 XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe) 使用。

trans-unit.source: Wsdl.exe uses the types or attribute declarations that are generated by XmlCodeExporter and the internal mappings generated by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> class to generate client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a WSDL document.
trans-unit.target: Wsdl.exe 使用类型或由 XmlCodeExporter 和由生成的内部映射生成的属性声明<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter>类来从 WSDL 文档生成客户端代理类或抽象服务器类。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter>

trans-unit.source: Wsdl.exe uses XmlCodeExporter and the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class when a WSDL document specifies: - Literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: Wsdl.exe 使用 XmlCodeExporter 和<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>类在 WSDL 文档指定:-使用文本，指示的内容的 SOAP 消息参数和返回值 （或请求和响应文档） 按原义指定使用 XML 架构定义。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>

trans-unit.source: - Non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: -非 SOAP Web 服务使用的 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的实现。

trans-unit.source: - Xsd.exe uses XmlCodeExporter to generate classes from XML Schema Definition (XSD) documents.
trans-unit.target: -Xsd.exe 使用 XmlCodeExporter 从 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档中生成的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref> class using the specified namespace.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref>类使用指定的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Instead of creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> class directly, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).
trans-unit.target: 而不是创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter>直接类，而使用 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 或 XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter>

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: 要生成的类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref> class using the specified namespace and code compile unit.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref>类使用指定的命名空间和代码编译单元。

trans-unit.source: Instead of creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> class directly, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).
trans-unit.target: 而不是创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter>直接类，而使用 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 或 XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter>

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: 要生成的类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A CodeDOM graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
trans-unit.target: 其中的 CodeDOM 图形容器使用自动添加的引用的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref> class using the specified namespace, code compile unit, and code generation options.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref>类使用指定的命名空间、 代码编译单元和代码生成选项。

trans-unit.source: Instead of creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> class directly, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) or the XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe).
trans-unit.target: 而不是创建的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter>直接类，而使用 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 或 XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter>

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: 要生成的类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>程序图容器使用的程序集引用自动添加到其中。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that provides options for generating .NET Framework types from XML schema custom data types.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，提供用于从 XML 架构自定义数据类型生成.NET Framework 类型的选项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref> class using the specified .NET Framework namespace, code compile unit containing the graph of the objects, an object representing code generation options, and a collection of mapping objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref>类使用指定的.NET Framework 命名空间、 包含图的对象，表示代码生成选项和映射对象的集合的对象的代码编译单元的。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: 要生成的类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>程序图容器使用的程序集引用自动添加到其中。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that provides options for generating .NET Framework types from XML schema custom data types.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，提供用于从 XML 架构自定义数据类型生成.NET Framework 类型的选项。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>对象。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref> class using the specified .NET Framework namespace, code compile unit containing the graph of the objects, an enumeration specifying code options, and a collection of mapping objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter"></xref>类使用指定的.NET Framework 命名空间、 代码编译单元包含图的对象，指定代码选项和映射对象的集合的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the types to generate.
trans-unit.target: 要生成的类型的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"> </xref>程序图容器使用的程序集引用自动添加到其中。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that provides options for generating .NET Framework types from XML schema custom data types.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，提供用于从 XML 架构自定义数据类型生成.NET Framework 类型的选项。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> that contains special instructions for code creation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"> </xref>包含关于创建代码的特殊说明。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping> objects.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"> </xref>包含<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>对象。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping>

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<part>" name="<part>" href=""></xref> element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>声明移到对应于方法参数或返回值<xref uid="langword_csharp_<part>" name="<part>" href=""> </xref> Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中的 SOAP 消息定义的元素。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: 以 WSDL 文档指定使用文本，指示 SOAP 消息参数和返回值 （或请求和响应文档） 的内容按原义指定使用 XML 架构定义时，Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref>生成到该方法将添加到属性声明的类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 消息定义的单个元素一部分内部.NET Framework 类型的映射。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空间的 SOAP 消息为其生成成员参数中的类型映射信息的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> declaration to a method return value that corresponds to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<part>" name="<part>" href=""></xref> element of a non-SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>到方法声明返回对应于值<xref uid="langword_csharp_<part>" name="<part>" href=""> </xref> Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中的非 SOAP 消息定义的元素。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies the .NET Framework's non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: 在 WSDL 文档指定的 Web 服务使用的 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的.NET Framework 的非 SOAP 实现时，Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 将使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref>生成到该方法将添加到属性声明的类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.
trans-unit.target: 内部.NET Framework 类型映射信息的 XML 架构元素。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空间的 SOAP 消息为其生成成员参数中的类型映射信息的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<part>" name="<part>" href=""></xref> element of a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>声明移到对应于方法参数或返回值<xref uid="langword_csharp_<part>" name="<part>" href=""> </xref> Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中的 SOAP 消息定义的元素。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 使用此方法时 WSDL 文档指定文本使用，该值指示 SOAP 消息参数的内容和使用 XML 架构定义按原义指定返回值 （或请求和响应文档）。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref>生成到该方法将添加到属性声明的类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 消息定义的单个元素一部分内部.NET Framework 类型的映射。

trans-unit.source: The XML namespace of the SOAP message part for which the type mapping information in the member parameter has been generated.
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空间的 SOAP 消息为其生成成员参数中的类型映射信息的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Flag that helps determine whether to add an initial argument containing the XML element name for the attribute declaration being generated.
trans-unit.target: 标记可帮助确定是否添加初始参数包含要生成的属性声明的 XML 元素名称。

trans-unit.source: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for each of the parts that belong to a SOAP message definition in a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: 生成.NET Framework 类型，以及属性声明，为每个属于 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档中的 SOAP 消息定义的部分。

trans-unit.source: The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method when a WSDL document specifies literal use, indicating that the contents of SOAP message parameters and return values (or request and response documents) are literally specified with XML schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 使用此方法时 WSDL 文档指定文本使用，该值指示 SOAP 消息参数的内容和使用 XML 架构定义按原义指定返回值 （或请求和响应文档）。

trans-unit.source: The internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
trans-unit.target: WSDL 消息定义的元素部分内部.NET Framework 类型的映射。

trans-unit.source: Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for an XML schema element.
trans-unit.target: 生成.NET Framework 类型，以及属性声明，XML 架构元素。

trans-unit.source: The Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) uses this method to generate SOAP message headers and return types when a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document specifies non-SOAP implementations of Web services using the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 使用此方法生成 SOAP 消息标头并返回类型，当 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档指定非 SOAP Web 服务使用的 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的实现。

trans-unit.source: The XML Schema Definition tool (Xsd.exe) uses this method to generate each of the XML schema element declarations in an XML Schema Definition (XSD) document.
trans-unit.target: XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe) 使用此方法在 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文档中生成的每个 XML 架构元素声明。

trans-unit.source: The internal .NET Framework type mapping information for an XML schema element.
trans-unit.target: 内部.NET Framework 类型映射信息的 XML 架构元素。
